title: 19. Disease Progression Modeling and Subtyping, Part 2
description:
MIT 6.S897 Machine Learning for Healthcare, Spring 2019
Instructor: David Sontag
View the complete course: https://ocw.mit.edu/6-S897S19
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP60B0PQXVQyGNdCyCTDU1Q5j

Prof. Sontag begins with a recap of the goal of disease progression modeling and then discusses staging from cross-sectional data and simultaneous staging and subtyping. 

License: Creative Commons BY-NC-SA
More information at https://ocw.mit.edu/terms
More courses at https://ocw.mit.edu

chapters.title: The big picture: generative model for patient data
Model for patient's disease progression across time
Model for data at single point in time: Noisy-OR network
Using anchors to ground the hidden variables
